componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

FLEXcon will be exhibiting in Booth #1311 at LABELEXPO AMERICAS 2022 at the Donald E. Stephens Convention Center in Chicago September 13 -15.

We invite you to stop by our booth where we'll be featuring new offerings from some of our most popular lines:
  • FLEXcon® NEXgen™
  • PHARMcal®
  • optiFLEX® ecoFOCUS™ HDPE
  • optiFLEX® ecoFOCUS™  PET
  • optiFLEX®

Are you attending or exhibiting at the show? Please let me know so we can keep an eye out for you.

Not registered yet?
